articles: [{"title": "\u2018Gladiator II\u2019 Cinematographer Denies Criticizing Ridley Scott as \u2018Lazy\u2019", "url": "https://petapixel.com/2024/12/04/gladiator-ii-cinematographer-john-mathieson-denies-criticizing-ridley-scott-director-as-lazy/", "description": "The Gladiator II cinematographer has attempted to walk back his comments accusing the movie\u2019s director Ridley Scott of becoming \u201clazy\u201d -- saying that his criticism was taken out of context.\n[Read More]", "publishedAt": "2024-12-04"}, {"title": "'We Certainly Didn\u2019t Want To Be A Pale Imitation': Gladiator II's Creators On The One Big Goal With Making A Sequel, And How The Story Came About", "url": "https://www.cinemablend.com/movies/gladiator-2-creators-one-big-goal-making-sequel-how-story-came-about", "description": "What we do in our careers echoes in development.", "publishedAt": "2024-12-03"}, {"title": "GLADIATOR II Producer Explains Why MOON KNIGHT Star May\u00a0Calamawy Was Cut From Ridley Scott's Sequel", "url": "https://comicbookmovie.com/action/gladiator-ii-producer-explains-why-moon-knight-star-maycalamawy-was-cut-from-ridley-scotts-sequel-a214847", "description": "Much has been said about Sir Ridley Scott's decision to cut Moon Knight star May\u00a0Calamawy from the sequel, and a producer has now weighed in on that and whether a Russell Crowe return was considered.", "publishedAt": "2024-12-03"}]
